Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Hermione. Bad dream. When did you get here?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Pleasure to meet you too sir. They walk on up the hill.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Why are they all standing around that manky old boot?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Those people tonight, in the masks... they're his too aren't they? they're his followers.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: There was a man. Before. There.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I dunno. I didn't see his face.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Oh no thank you I'm not hungry.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Well there's something you don't see every day.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I don't know but I don't think it's Pumpkin Juice.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Yeah well rather you than me.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I didn't ask for this to happen Ron. Okay? You're being stupid.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I didn't put my name in that cup. I don't WANT eternal glory I just wanna be.. Look, I don't know what happened tonight and I don't know why, it just did ok.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I dunno I haven't really thought about it.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Hey, my eyes aren't glistening with the ghosts of my past.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: No. Umm.. Voldemort was giving him a job to do. Something important.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: He wanted... me. I dunno why, but he was gonna use this man to get to me. I mean it was only a dream right?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Do you think one of them put my name in the goblet?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I'm not ready for this Sirius.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Who says I was talking to anyone.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Maybe you're imagining things, wouldn't be the first time.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Magical water plants of the highland Lochs?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Yeah I brought the cloak. Hagrid where are we going?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: What's with the flower? Hagrid have you combed your hair?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Dragons? That's the first task? You're joking.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: No he didn't. He didn't tell me a thing.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Dragons. That's the first task. They've got one for each of us.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: You're a right foul git you know that?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I don't give a damn what you or your father thinks Malfoy. He's vile and cruel, and you're just pathetic.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Oh... um... You know I just thought I'd...

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Um... I dunno.. I can fly. I mean I'm a fair flyer.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: But I'm not allowed a broom.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Who wants me to open it? You want me to open it?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: What the bloody hell was that?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Caught on have you. Took you long enough.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Brilliant. That makes me feel loads better.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Hagrid warned me about the dragons.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Who could possibly figure that out? That's completely mental.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Well it does match your eyes. Is there a bonnet?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: (To the Weasly twins) Oi! Never gonna let him forget this are you?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Why do they always have to travel in packs? How are you supposed to get one alone to ask them...

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I think I'd take the dragon right now.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: But then again he can take himself.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Um. (Mumbling) I just wondered if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Um. I was just wondering if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Ok. Great. Fine. No problem. Good.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Well I expect yours are more traditional.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Because we'd take the mickey out of her if she did.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Really? I had no idea. I suppose Viktor's already figured it out.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Forget about it. I'm sure you would have done the same for me.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I must be out of my mind.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Polyjuice potion! Kicked the habit. Myrtle, did you say try putting it in the water?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Myrtle, there aren't Merpeople in the black lake are there?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Come seek us where our voices sound.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: An hour long you'll have to look.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Potentially problematic? When was the last time you held your breath under the water for an hour Hermione?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Neville. No offense, but I really don't care about plants. Now if there's a Tibetan turnip that will allow me to breathe underwater for an hour then great.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: You're telling me this now? You must be joking.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Well that makes you sight better than Ron and Hermione. Where are they anyway?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I can come back later Professor.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Sir, Mr Crouch's son, what happened to him?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: It's just that I had a dream about him. It was in the summer, before school. In the dream I was in a house and Voldemort was there only he wasn't quite human, and Wormtail was there too and Mr Crouch's son.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Yes. Always the same one. Sir... these dreams, what I see, you don't think it's actually happening do you?

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: For a moment so did I.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Together, on three. One, two, three!

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I've been here before in a dream. Cedric, we have to get back to the cup? Now!

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: He's back, he's back! Voldemort's back. Cedric, he asked me to bring his body back. I couldn't leave him, not there.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: The cup was a portkey. Someone had bewitched it.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: I dunno. It was like I'd fallen into one of my dreams. One of my nightmares.

Speaker: HARRY
Conversation: Um. I don't think I said anything about a graveyard Professor.

Conversation: It was you from the beginning. You put my name in the goblet of fire. You bewitched Krum. But...
